pages.text: Arkarua is a small precambrian disk like animal with a number of radial ridges on the rim and a star like impression. It is unknown what kind of animal Arkarua was and classification is problematic.
$(l)Eats:$() N/A$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() N/A$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() N/A$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Shears
